title: Flexible Content Blocks

fields.label: Blocks
fields.name: blocks
fields.instructions: Allows you to create a number of content rows/blocks and drop and drag them into place. A number of predetermined have been added to experiment with.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a title for this block

sub_fields.label: Subtitle
sub_fields.name: subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: Add a subtitle for this block

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Add content as styled HTML

sub_fields.label: CSS Class
sub_fields.name: css_class
sub_fields.instructions: Add a class name to this block to style it in the theme's CSS.
